game.name: Grand Galaxy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play as Bonnie, a bounty hunter bunny stranded on the desert world of Sandaria after failing to pay ruthless collector Myiss Kyzorga. Fight, scavenge, and outwit enemies to reclaim your stolen ship and settle your galactic debts.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as Bonnie, a bounty hunter bunny stranded on the desert world of Sandaria after failing to pay ruthless collector Myiss Kyzorga. Fight, scavenge, and outwit enemies to reclaim your stolen ship and settle your galactic debts.
